Description: B.C. Rich Wartribe KKW Signature Special Series Electric Guitar Onyx with Red Fire, Hard Coffin Case, & Black Leather Bullet Guitar Strap, Wartribe is one of the most popular models from the Kerry King signature series made by B. C. Rich. Thrash metal legend is a long-time B. C. Rich fan and endorser and his signature series is both the biggest and most popular of all B. C. Signature Artist lines. Wartribe comes with a solid Warlock body made of mahogany. it is paired with a bolt-on neck made of maple. Wartribe is painted in black and has Red Fire custom graphic. Black color has been chosen for the hardware. Kahler bridge is installed on the top and it is fronted with a pair of B. C. Rich BSDM pickups. Master volume, master tone and a three-way toggle pickup switch comprise the controls unit. Maple neck is topped with a 24-fret rosewood fingerboard. Custom Features: Color Matched Beast Headstock, Kahler ® X Trem, BC Rich B.S.D.M. Pickups Fingerboard Inlays Custom Kerry King Inlay At 12th Fret Wartribe Full Specs: Body Shape Warlock Body Type Solid Body Body Wood Mahogany Bridge Kahler Locking Tremolo Locking Nut Yes Neck Wood Maple Number of Pickups 2 Bridge Pickup Type Humbucker Neck Pickup Type Humbucker Controls Volume Controls Tone Scale Length 25-1/2" Neck Joint Bolt-on Fingerboard Material Rosewood Hardware Chrome Number of Frets 24 Fret Size Jumbo Number of Strings 6 Tuners B.C.Rich Tuners Die-cast Neck Shape Series Standard Pickup Switch Type3 -way Pickup Selector
